DOC.brief_summary: Investigators will perform a randomized controlled trial comparing the effect of transabdominal and transperineal ultrasound in pregnant women in the second stage of labor, in whom it was decided an operative delivery. Our objective is to evaluate the impact of intrapartal ultrasound measurements, as an auxiliary to clinical evaluation, in the efficacy of an instrumental delivery.
DOC.brief_title: Role of Intrapartum Ultrasound in Instrumental Delivery
DOC.criteria: pregnant women at term, in labor (â‰¥ 37 weeks of gestation dated by a first trimester ultrasound live singleton pregnancy fetus in a cephalic presentation in the second stage of labor, after the decision to perform an instrumental delivery fetal malformations emergency situation
